title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 920.3 - Eligible program applicants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 920.3 - Eligible program applicants

State Regulations

The following individuals, organizations or entities shall be
eligible to apply for grants under this Part: (a) private businesses; (b) service delivery area grant recipients or
administrative entities; (c) private nonprofit organizations; (d) units of general local government in the
substate area, or agencies thereof; (e) local offices of State
agencies; (f) public agencies, such
as community colleges and area vocational schools; (g) private industry councils; (h) employers and employer
organizations; (i) employee
organizations and labor organizations; (j) community-based organizations; (k) joint apprentice committees; (l) other entities with experience and
capability to define and address the needs of distressed industries and the
employment and training needs and required services for the targeted
population. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
920.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
